Articles.Content:
The purpose of this add-on is to provide KSP Modders a better coding environment of KSP cfg files.

Functions:

1. Autocomplete keywords(https://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Module).

2. Keywords and part of syntax highlight.

Attention:

*Please make sure you've installed the latest Visual Studio Code.

*Please make sure you've put the expansion file into C:\Users\*\.vscode\extensions, and adjust the language to cfg at the bottom right corner.

I really hope that users can provide some feedback and suggestions (eg.: new keyword list, new highlight list), I'll really appreciate that.

license: CC BY-NC-ND 4.0

Download link: https://github.com/buguniao55555/KSP-cfg/releases/tag/V0.1.

Edited November 22, 2018 by buguniao

oo! Looking forward to trying this out.

I have a somewhat simplistic code highlighter in Sublime Code, but this sound much nicer.
